channel.title: COVID-19 on CAMGDP: Central Asia and Mongolia Gender Data Portal
channel.description: Recent content in COVID-19 on CAMGDP: Central Asia and Mongolia Gender Data Portal

item.title: Gender Economics Research Center
item.description: Founded in 2018 with the assistance of the Soros Foundation-Kazakhstan, Gender Economics Research Center (GERC) is a research center at Narxoz University, Almaty. GERC is dedicated to development and coordination of research on gender and economy. The center publishes research articles and reports on the topics of labor market, education, COVID-19 impact, and others.

Public Opinion Research Institute is a Kazakhstani sociological institute specializes in public opinion, marketing, and sociological studies of Kazakhstan and other countries. The institute publishes research reports on various topics, including COVID-19, migration, social values, etc. Most publications are available in Kazakh and Russian with occasional translation to English.
